TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pnguu, title = Pnguu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pnguu} }

S.FORM: Pnguu Itiniay i Alishan Cen no Chiayi ko Pnguu a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 352 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 341 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Cou94%, Bunun1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.

Pngoo Itiniay i Alishan Cen no Chiayi ko Pngoo a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 352 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 341 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Coo94%, Bonon1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.
